introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is AI Detector
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: AI Detector uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze content and identify whether it was generated by artificial intelligence or created by humans.

image.alt: Illustration of a man checking if content is AI-generated on a computer screen

items.title: Instant Detection
items.description: Upload any image and get results in seconds with our real-time AI analysis technology.

items.title: Advanced Algorithms
items.description: Uses state-of-the-art machine learning models trained on millions of images for accurate detection.

items.title: Privacy First
items.description: Your uploaded images are processed securely and never stored on our servers.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose AI Detector
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Protect yourself and your organization from AI-generated content fraud with our industry-leading AI Detector technology.

items.title: Combat Fake News
items.description: Identify AI-generated images used in misinformation campaigns and protect against fake news propaganda.

image.alt: Illustration showing combat fake news with website and megaphone icon

items.title: Prevent Art Theft
items.description: Detect unauthorized AI reproductions of original artwork and protect intellectual property rights.

image.alt: Minimalist graphic prevent art theft with framed artwork and thief icon

items.title: Stop Identity Fraud
items.description: Identify deepfake profile pictures and AI-generated identity documents to prevent fraud and scams.

image.alt: Simple illustration stop identity fraud with ID card and masked figure icon

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use AI Detector
usage.description: Identify AI-generated content in three simple steps:

items.title: Upload Your Content
items.description: Drag and drop any file or paste a URL. Supports images, text, and other common formats.

image.alt: Upload interface for AI Detector content analysis

items.title: AI Analysis
items.description: Our advanced algorithms analyze the content for telltale signs of AI generation in seconds.

image.alt: AI Detector analysis dashboard showing detection process

items.title: Get Results
items.description: Receive a confidence score and detailed analysis showing why the content was flagged as AI or human-created.

image.alt: AI Detector results screen with confidence score and analysis

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features of AI Detector
feature.description: Advanced technology to identify AI-generated content with precision and speed.

items.title: Real-time Detection
items.description: Get instant results with our lightning-fast analysis that processes content in seconds.

items.title: High Accuracy Rate
items.description: Industry-leading detection accuracy trained on millions of AI and human-generated content.

items.title: Multiple Upload Methods
items.description: Support for drag-and-drop, file upload, URL input, and clipboard paste for maximum convenience.

items.title: Detailed Reports
items.description: Comprehensive analysis reports with confidence scores and detection reasoning.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About AI Detector
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email or check our documentation.

items.title: How accurate is the AI Detector?
items.description: Our AI Detector achieves over 95% accuracy in identifying AI-generated images and audio content. The system is trained on millions of samples and continuously updated to detect the latest AI generation techniques.

items.title: What types of AI-generated content can it detect?
items.description: We can detect images created by DALL-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion and audio generated by AI voice tools. Our AI Detector identifies common artifacts and patterns specific to AI generation in both visual and audio content.

items.title: Is my uploaded content data stored or shared?
items.description: No, we prioritize your privacy. Uploaded images and audio files are processed in real-time and immediately deleted after analysis. We never store, share, or use your content for any other purpose.

items.title: What should I do if I get an incorrect result?
items.description: While our system is highly accurate, no detection method is 100% perfect. We're currently in BETA and continuously improving. You can report incorrect results to help us enhance our algorithms.
